name: Cthulhu Waits Dreaming
description:
Cthulhu Waits Dreaming is an homage to 80's gaming. Can you escape the caves or will you just be another servant to this cosmic entity? 

This is my first ever game released to the public.  I made it in a single day, with no prior coding experience. I wanted to make something that would act as a prototype for my games going forward and really improve my c# skills. 

I hope you enjoy playing this short and creepy adventure! 

- Brendan.
